name: Plant Therapy
description:
An unapologetically cozy plant collecting game.
Build a beautiful indoor garden from the ground up in your New York City apartment.

CARE FOR YOUR PLANTS


  • Water and fertilize your plants and get rewarded with coins to buy more plants
  • 60+ unique plants
  • Repot plants
  • Name your plants
  • Grow plants from sprouts
  • Collect achievements to unlock other decorations and plants

DECORATE YOUR APARTMENT


Collect artwork and furniture and decorate your space.

RELAX


Enjoy the peace and quiet of taking care of your plants while listening to the cozy soundtrack.
